data.title: Managed Security Services Overview - VeriSign
data.text: Managed Security Services Overview As companies continue to enlist the Internet to expedite business processes, the incurred security risk grows in accordance. Today, many organisations provide network access to partners, suppliers, customers and mobile employees fostering opportunities for people with ill intent. Although these organisations may establish strong perimeter security, it is only a first line of defence. Bottom Line For an organisation to effectively safeguard critical information, it takes more than integrating the latest security hardware and software. A complete security program including around-the-clock management and monitoring, real-time security intelligence, global infrastructure and a staff of 24 hours a day 7days a week (24x&) security experts are key elements for keepingpace with today’s increasingly complex network security threats. Description As the cornerstone of VeriSign Network Security solutions, the company’s Managed Security Services (MSSs) enable the 24x7 expert monitoring and management of network security infrastructures. Through VeriSign’s security information management architecture called TeraGuard TM , the company can quickly and accurately identify critical security issues and alert clients of impending danger, while preparing appropriate response measures. VeriSign’s MSS is built on a strong foundation of around-the-clock, mission critical services that are rooted in the company’s global Internet infrastructure. VeriSign MSS delivers security monitoring and management through a powerful combination of an intelligent management platform, expert security professionals and well-designed and proven processes. Available Managed Security Services • Managed Firewall • Managed Intrusion Detection • Managed VPN • Managed Vulnerability Protection (MVPS) • Managed Incident Response and Forensics • Business Protection Service (BPS) Key Benefits Lower Total Cost – Whether outsourcing a single device or an entire security infrastructure, VeriSign reduces a company’s operational costs while increasing the effectiveness of your security program. 24x7 Management,Monitoring and Support – When a client calls, VeriSign answers. VeriSign security analysts work nights, weekends and holidays so our clients don’t have to. Trained and Dedicated Professionals – VeriSign’s certified security professionals undergo extensive security training and rigorous background checks prior to managing or monitoring a client’s equipment. Powerful Event Correlation via TeraGuard – VeriSign’s information management architecture, TeraGuard, takes a wide range of disparate data sources from security and network devices and converts them into a single,normalised stream of security-related events. It then analyses and prioritises these events using a multi-tiered correlation process, enabling VeriSign to quickly eliminate false positives, to find real threats and to take action.
